title: Does Diversity Training Work? With Calvin Lai, PhD
itunes:title: Does Diversity Training Work? With Calvin Lai, PhD
description: In our increasingly diverse country, many workplaces have implemented diversity training programs aimed at fostering cohesion, mutual respect and understanding among employees of different backgrounds. Calvin Lai, PhD, an assistant professor of psychology at Washington University in St. Louis, discusses what we can learn from psychological research about whether diversity training works and what makes for effective training.
